module.name: SIMPLER-NETWORKS-MIB
module.contact: Simpler Networks Inc. 1975 Boul. Hymus, Suite 225 Dorval, Quebec, H9P 1J8 Canada info@simplernetworks.com 1-514-898-2629
module.description: The management information definitions for the Simpler Networks EZ-EDGE product. Copyright (C) Simpler Networks Inc. (1999-2016).

revision.description: Changes in this revision: - Added version information.

table.name: sniConnTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view / create cross connections.

row.name: sniConnEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry to view / create cross connections.

column.name: sniConnFromEndPointCard
column.description: The from end point access card index of this connection.

column.name: sniConnFromEndPointPort
column.description: The from end point port index on the 'from card' of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToEndPointCard
column.description: The to end point access card index of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToEndPointPort
column.description: The to end point port index on the 'to card' of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToServiceId
column.description: The to end point port service ID of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToLookOutTapPort
column.description: The to end point 'look out' tap port index on the 'from card' of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToLookInTapPort
column.description: The to end point 'look in' tap port index on the 'to card' of this connection.

column.name: sniConnFromEndPointAlias
column.description: The from end point alias of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToEndPointAlias
column.description: The to end point alias of this connection.

column.name: sniConnFromEndPointAid
column.description: The from end point aid of this connection.

column.name: sniConnToEndPointAid
column.description: The to end point aid of this connection.

column.name: sniConnCircuitId
column.description: An optional descriptive name for this connection's circuit ID.

column.name: sniConnAdministrativeState
column.description: The administrative state of this connection.

column.name: sniConnOperationalState
column.description: The operational state of this connection.

column.name: sniConnAvailabilityStatus
column.description: The availability status of this connection.

column.name: sniConnRowStatus
column.description: The status of this conceptual row.

table.name: sniTransferServerTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view / set transfer servers.

row.name: sniTransferServerEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry to view / set transfer servers.

column.name: sniTransferServerIndex
column.description: There are 3 different servers that are defined based on the type of transfers that the system supports. The indexes are predetermined.

column.name: sniTransferServerAddr
column.description: The IP address of the file transfer server.

column.name: sniTransferServerUserId
column.description: A valid user name predefined on the specified server.

column.name: sniTransferServerPassword
column.description: The specified user's password on the specified server.

column.name: sniTransferServerFile
column.description: The path and file to manipulate on / from the specifed server.

column.name: sniTransferServerDirection
column.description:
The direction of the file transfer. The default is to.
For backup and restore we need both direction. For software only the from direction and for logs only the to direction.

column.name: sniTransferServerState
column.description:
This is the state of the requested file transfer. The initiator will have to poll to monitor the progress of the file transfer.
(1) queued - The request has been accepted and queued. Waiting to be processed - Read only (2) transmitting - The request has been taken from the queue and being processed - Read only (3) completed - The file has be successfully transmitted - Read only (4) failed - The file transfer has failed - Read only (5) transmit - Starts the processing of the request - Write only (6) reset - Resets the values to their default - Write only

table.name: sniCableSwapTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to swap a group of create cross connections.

row.name: sniCableSwapEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry swap a group of cross connections.

column.name: sniCableSwapTableIndex
column.description: The index of this table.

column.name: sniCableSwapFromBundleID
column.description: The from-bundle of ports ID.

column.name: sniCableSwapToBundleID
column.description: The to-bundle of ports ID.

column.name: sniCableSwapTableState
column.description: The state of this cable swap command.

scalar.name: sniNtpServerAddr
scalar.description: The IP address of the NTP server.

scalar.name: sniDateTime
scalar.description: The number of seconds since epoch (1970-01-01).

scalar.name: sniTrapLogLastEntry
scalar.description: The index of the last log entry.

scalar.name: sniTrapLogMaxEntries
scalar.description: The maximum number of entries in the trap log.

table.name: sniTrapLogTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view sent events and alarms.

row.name: sniTrapLogEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry of a sent event or alarm.

column.name: sniTrapLogIndex
column.description: Internal trap index of sent notification.

column.name: sniTrapLogTimeStamp
column.description: Time value when the trap was generated.

column.name: sniTrapLogOid
column.description: Trap's OID

column.name: sniTrapLogSeverity
column.description: The trap's severity level.

column.name: sniTrapLogTrapType
column.description: The trap's type.

column.name: sniTrapLogServiceAffecting
column.description:
Indentifies whether the trap is service affecting or not.
(1) sa - service affecting condition. (2) nsa - non-service affecting condition.

column.name: sniTrapLogTrapInfo
column.description: Dynamic free form text describing the trap.

table.name: sniActiveAlarmTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view active alarms.

row.name: sniActiveAlarmEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry of an active alarm.

column.name: sniActiveAlarmIndex
column.description: Internal index of the sent alarm.

column.name: sniActiveAlarmTimeStamp
column.description: Time value when the alarm was generated.

column.name: sniActiveAlarmOid
column.description: The alarm's OID

column.name: sniActiveAlarmSeverity
column.description: The alarm's severity level.

column.name: sniActiveAlarmServiceAffecting
column.description:
Indentifies whether the alarm is service affecting or not.
(1) sa - service affecting condition. (2) nsa - non-service affecting condition.

column.name: sniActiveAlarmTrapInfo
column.description: Dynamic free form text describing the alarm.

table.name: sniTrapDestTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view / create trap destinations.

row.name: sniTrapDestEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry of a trap destination to view / create.

column.name: sniTrapDestAddr
column.description: SNMP trap destination address of the server listening for traps.

column.name: sniTrapDestUser
column.description: The user the trap is sent on behalf of.

column.name: sniTrapDestRowStatus
column.description: The status of this conceptual row.

scalar.name: sniEntitySystemSubPortCapacity
scalar.description: The number of possible ports on the subscriber side.

scalar.name: sniEntitySystemOePortCapacity
scalar.description: The number of possible ports on the oe side.

column.name: sniEntityCardHardwareRev

table.name: sniEntityPortTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view / update port entities.

row.name: sniEntityPortEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry of a port entity to view / update.

column.name: sniEntityPortCardIndex
column.description: The card index where the port index physically resides.

column.name: sniEntityPortIndex
column.description: The port's index.

column.name: sniEntityPortAid
column.description: The port's AID.

column.name: sniEntityPortAdministrativeState
column.description: The port's current administrative state.

column.name: sniEntityPortOperationalState
column.description: The port's current operational state.

column.name: sniEntityPortAvailabilityStatus
column.description: The port's current availability status.

column.name: sniEntityPortAlias
column.description: The port's alias name.

column.name: sniEntityPortServiceId
column.description: The port's service ID.

table.name: sniEntityServiceTable
table.description: Simpler Networks Inc table to view / update service entities.

row.name: sniEntityServiceEntry
row.description: Simpler Networks Inc table entry of a service entity to view / update.

column.name: sniEntityServiceId
column.description: The service Id.

column.name: sniEntityServiceAid
column.description: The service unique index -Aid.

column.name: sniEntityServiceName
column.description: The service name - like POTS or ISDN.

column.name: sniEntityServiceSysCr
column.description: The threshold to arise critical alarm for system.

column.description: The threshold to arise major alarm for system.

column.name: sniEntityServiceSysMin
column.description: The threshold to arise minor alarm for system.

column.name: sniEntityServiceCardCr
column.description: The threshold to arise critical alarm for funnel card.

column.name: sniEntityServiceCardMaj
column.description: The threshold to arise major alarm for funnel card.

column.name: sniEntityServiceCardMin
column.description: The threshold to arise minor alarm for funnel card.

column.name: sniEntityServicePriority
column.description: The service's priortiy that is low to allow connection go throgh the overflow card.

column.name: sniEntityServiceDefault
column.description: The service default state.

column.name: sniEntityServiceReadOnly
column.description: The service read/write status.

column.name: sniEntityTapConnToTap

column.name: sniEntityTapConnOperationalState
column.description: The current operational state of tap connection

column.name: sniEntityTapConnAvailabilityStatus
column.description: The current availability status of tap connection.

scalar.name: sniSpinLock
scalar.description: An advisory lock used to allow several cooperating Command Generator Applications to coordinate their use of facilities to alter data in the ezedge database.

notification.name: sniSoftwareUpgradeTrap
notification.description: A software upgrade has been initiated.

notification.name: sniSystemContactModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system contact has been modified.

notification.name: sniSystemNameModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system name has been modified.

notification.name: sniSystemLocationModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system location has been modified.

notification.name: sniSystemIDModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system ID has been modified.

notification.name: sniSystemConfigurationModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system configuration has been modified.

notification.name: sniTrapTargetAddedTrap
notification.description: A trap target has been added.

notification.name: sniTrapTargetModifiedTrap
notification.description: A trap target has been modified.

notification.name: sniTrapTargetDeletedTrap

notification.name: sniSystemIpModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system IP address has been modified.

notification.name: sniNtpServerModifiedTrap
notification.description: The NTP server address has been modified.

notification.name: sniDateAndTimeModifiedTrap
notification.description: The system date and time has been modified.

notification.name: sniDatabaseRestoredTrap
notification.description: A database has been restored.

notification.name: sniNewSoftwareInstalledTrap
notification.description: A new software load has been installed.

notification.name: sniEntityStateChangeTrap
notification.description: A state change occured on an entity.

notification.name: sniLciLoginTrap
notification.description: A user has logged in on the local craft port.

notification.name: sniLciLogoutTrap
notification.description: A user has logged out from the local craft port.

notification.name: sniLciFailedLoginAttemptTrap
notification.description: Local Craft Interface failed login attempt.

notification.name: sniLciIntrusionAttemptTrap
notification.description: Local Craft Interface intrusion attempt.

notification.name: sniLCIUserAddedTrap
notification.description: A LCI user was added.

notification.name: sniLCIUserModifiedTrap
notification.description: A LCI user was modified.

notification.name: sniLCIUserDeletedTrap
notification.description: A LCI user was deleted.

notification.name: sniSnmpUsmUserAddedTrap

notification.name: sniSnmpUsmUserModifiedTrap
notification.description: An SNMP USM user was modified.

notification.name: sniSnmpUsmUserDeletedTrap
notification.description: An SNMP USM user was deleted.

notification.name: sniConnectionAddedTrap
notification.description: A connection was added.

notification.name: sniConnectionDeletedTrap
notification.description: A connection was deleted.

notification.name: sniConnectionModifiedTrap
notification.description: A connection was modified.

notification.name: sniPortModifiedTrap
notification.description: A port was modified.

notification.name: sniEquipmentInsertedTrap
notification.description: A card was inserted.

notification.name: sniEquipmentRemovedTrap
notification.description: A card was removed.

notification.name: sniCreateTapTrap
notification.description: Create a tap.

notification.name: sniDeleteTapTrap
notification.description: Delete a tap.

notification.name: sniDefineServiceTrap
notification.description: Define one service.

notification.name: sniSwapCableTrap
notification.description: Swap two bundle cables.

notification.name: sniSysRebootTrap
notification.description: The street cabinet is in its initialization phase.

notification.name: sniEntityFailedTrap
notification.description: The system has detected that an entity has been failed.

notification.name: sniEntityDegradedTrap
notification.description: The system has detected that an entity has been degraded.

notification.name: sniEntityMissingTrap
notification.description: The system has detected that an entity is missing.

notification.name: sniEntityMismatchTrap
notification.description: The system has detected that an entity is mismatched.

notification.name: sniEntitySeverlyHighTempTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its severly high temperature threshold has been passed.

notification.name: sniEntityHighTempTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its high temperature threshold has been passed.

notification.name: sniEntitySeverlyLowTempTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its severly low temperature threshold has been passed.

notification.name: sniEntityLowTempTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its low temperature threshold has been passed.

notification.name: sniEntityHighBlockingRatioTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its blocking ratio is high.

notification.name: sniEntityMediumBlockingRatioTrap
notification.description: An entity has detected that its blocking ratio is medium.

notification.name: sniEntityDbFailureTrap
notification.description: The database has failed.

notification.name: sniEntityDbMissingTrap
notification.description: Database missing.

notification.name: sniEntityDbMismatchTrap
notification.description: Database mismatched.

notification.name: sniConnectionLostTrap
notification.description: A connection was lost.

notification.name: sniNtpUnreachableTrap
notification.description: The defined NTP server is not reachable.

notification.name: sniSystemTimeNotSetTrap
notification.description: The system time is not set.

notification.name: sniEntityCardServiceMinorTrap
notification.description: A Funnel card has detected that usage of service reaches minor level.

notification.name: sniEntityCardServiceMajorTrap
notification.description: A Funnel card has detected that usage of service reaches major level.

notification.name: sniEntityCardServiceCriticalTrap
notification.description: A Funnel card has detected that usage of service reaches critical level.

notification.name: sniEntityConnectionTappedMajorTrap
notification.description: Connection is being tapped.

notification.name: sniEntityConnectionPendingSwapTrap
notification.description: Connection is being swapped.

notification.name: sniCommandSuccessTrap
notification.description: An SNMP SET command succeeded.

notification.name: sniCommandFailureTrap
notification.description: An SNMP SET command failed.
